pyCoalesce¶

pyCoalesce is a Python wrapper for the Coalesce RESTful API. The package includes functions for interacting with the API’s search and CRUD controllers (pyCoalesce.coalesce_request) and objects for working with XML representations of Coalesce entities (pyCoalesce.classes). The Coalesce API also supports JSON representations of entities, but, since JSON objects closely resemble native Python dict and list objects, the packages assumes that no special handling is required interacting with the API using JSON.
